1. Always write in Australian English.
2. Don't make up factual information. If you don't know an answer to something or can't find the answer, I rather you say you don't know.
3. When formatting in pages in this repository, always try and use mardown, then hugo+hextera solutions before resorting to html.
4. When writing news stories: 
4.1. timestamp the story
4.2. for manuscripts, rename to always start with "ms-<YYYY>-" prefix, with a seensible short name.
4.3. for talks "talk-<YYYY>-" prefix and a sensible short name.
